    • Uses of ErrorDiffusionDitherStrategy in uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.errordiffusionstrategy

      Classes in uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.errordiffusionstrategy that implement ErrorDiffusionDitherStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AtkinsonDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Atkinson error diffusion algorithm
      class  BurkesDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Burkes error diffusion algorithm
      class  FloydSteinbergDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Floyd-Steinberg error diffusion algorithm
      class  JarvisJudiceNinkeDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Jarvis-Judice-Ninke error diffusion algorithm
      class  LowErrorAtkinsonDitherStrategy
      Special low error dither strategy especially for Spectrum image conversion and only (currently) in use in this program, based on the Atkinson distribution but using only 25% error distribution.
      class  NoDitherStrategy
      Direct colour conversion with no error distribution (hence no error is distributed in distributeError()!)
      class  SierraFilterLightStrategy
      Implementation of the Sierra Filter Light error diffusion algorithm
      class  StuckiDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Stucki error diffusion algorithm
